Consolidate Reports

Source: R/GTAPauto.R
dot-consolidate_reports.Rd

Consolidates multiple Excel report files into a single report and optionally removes source files.

Usage

.consolidate_reports(
  output_folder,
  pattern = "\\.xlsx$",
  final_name = "Report_Output.xlsx",
  remove_sources = TRUE,
  chunk_size = 10
)

Arguments

output_folder

Character. Directory where the Excel files are located.

pattern

Character. Pattern to match Excel files (default: "\.xlsx$").

final_name

Character. Name for the final consolidated report file (default: "Report_Output.xlsx").

remove_sources

Logical. If TRUE, source files will be removed after consolidation (default: TRUE).

chunk_size

Numeric. Number of files to process in each chunk (default: 10).

Value

Invisibly returns TRUE if consolidation is successful, or FALSE if no files are found.

See also

process_gtap_data

Author

Pattawee Puangchit
